Best_Sellers.title: Classic Belt - Cognac
Best_Sellers.desc: Perfectly styled for any occasion. A classic whether worn with denim, cords or chinos. This belt will only get better with age. The edges are dyed, burnished, waxed and each one is stamped with our signature makers mark.

Best_Sellers.title: Standard Mug
Best_Sellers.desc: Whether youâ€™re greeting your day over coffee or mixing a hot toddy to welcome the evening, the Standard Mug brings the rich feel of hand-crafted ceramics to your table. The handle and body are slip cast together to provide a solid yet comfortable grip. The tapered, unglazed foot allows sets to nest together neatly on open shelving or counter tops.Mazama ceramics are handmade and some variation is to be expected. Mazama ceramics can be washed safely in the dishwasher, however, we recommend hand washing for the longest lifespan. For further information about how to care for your ceramics, please see our ceramic care page.

Best_Sellers.title: Journeyman - Natural
Best_Sellers.desc: The Journeyman is a perfect example of how a great concept can spring from our collaborative nature as a company. Born from an idea proposed by our retail staff, this slim-yet-sturdy wallet was subsequently designed, developed and sampled by our design-minded craftspeople on the workshop floor.Cut from 3.5oz Natural tooling leather, the Journeyman features four card slots and one central pocket for you to stash your cash - a configuration those who prefer to carry their wallet in their front pocket would appreciate.

Best_Sellers.title: Journeyman - Natural
Best_Sellers.desc: The Standard Belt emphasizes utilitarian styling and is built to last and improve with age. Featuring a matching leather keep and metal hardware, the edges are dyed, burnished, waxed, and each belt is stamped with our signature makers mark.
